LanguageData.Ammo_Nail.label: Nails
LanguageData.Ammo_Nail.description: Nails - Although it deals moderate damage, it is very effective at damaging limbs, often in one shot. When shot to kill, it can tear off a damaged body part or pin the enemy to a wall if it is located close enough behind them..
LanguageData.Bullet_Nail.label: Nails
LanguageData.Bullet_Nail_HV.label: Uranium Nails
